title: PSA: Silver is harder than Diamond.
body: Really, Silver is an uncarriable cesspool of players worse than bots.

replies.body: Then can you do me a favour and do my Diamond Promos and I'll win your silver games?

> [{quoted}](name=IShaunI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YWKLQ34p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-28T07:19:18.581+0000)
>
> Then can you do me a favour and** do my Diamond Promos** and I'll win your silver games?

I only have to do them right? SURE!
